controller

Class PhotoListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PhotoListController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Errorable, Logoutable

    public class PhotoListController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Errorable, Logoutable
    The controller for the list of photos in an album. This controller implements Errorable and Logoutable.
    Author:
    Corentin Rejaud, Julia Sutula
